title: Superannuation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and 
Superannuation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (Part 7) (Commencement) 
Order 2024.

title: Superannuation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024), hereby
heading: 2. The 27th day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 7
text_raw:
2. The 27th day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 7 
of the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and Superannuation (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 September, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [486] 3
